thread.title: Anushka Sharma again targetted on Twitter for Virat Kohli's dismissal in 5th ODI
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma again targetted on Twitter for Virat Kohli's dismissal in 5th ODI

title: Anushka Sharma again targetted on Twitter for Virat Kohli's dismissal in 5th ODI
text:
Published: Sunday, October 25, 2015, 21:32 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
Mumbai, Oct 25: Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma once again faced ire of some insensitive cricket fans on micro-blogging website Twitter. 
After her cricketer boy friend Virat Kohli failed to perform in the 5th and final ODI at Wankhede Stadium on Sunday, Anushka was again targetted. ( 5th ODI: Records tumbled at Wankhede Stadium ) 
Television screens showed Anushka sitting in the VIP box, watching Kohli bat. But, soon after Kohli came out to bat into the middle. 
Virat failed to perform with the bat and left his side reeling under trouble. Soon after Kohli's departure at an individual score of 7, cricketing fans took to Twitter to once again blame the actress for Virat's poor show. [ Virat Kohli not to marry Anushka Sharma in 2015? ] 
The audience had also blamed Anushka for Team India's loss in the World Cup semifinals at the hands of Australia. 
However, there were also those who slammed those for blaming the actress for their favourite cricketer's dismissal. 
Here are a few such tweets: Just a Gentle Reminder : Anushka Sharma is in stadium. #IndvsSA â€” Chicken Biryani (@ChickenBiryanii) October 25, 2015 Anushka sharma can go back to home now with Virat kohli
